style.css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')   { .controls_section li .followers:before { position: absolute !important; height: 30px !important; line-height: 28px !important; width: 92px !important; font: inherit !important; } a.followers div.hide_overflow{ visibility: hidden !important; } .controls_section li .followers:before { content: "Mouseketeers" !important; } }
